results.definition: take a court case to a higher court for review
examples: He was found guilty but appealed immediately

results.definition: request earnestly (something from somebody); ask for aid or protection
examples: Invoke God in times of trouble
The idea of a vacation appeals to me
The beautiful garden attracted many people

results.definition: cite as an authority; resort to
examples: He invoked the law that would save him
I appealed to the law of 1900

results.definition: able to attract interest or draw favorable attention
examples: He added an appealing and memorable figure to popular American mythology"- Vincent Starrett
the idea of having enough money to retire at fifty is very appealing

results.definition: (of characters in literature or drama) evoking empathic or sympathetic feelings
examples: the sympathetic characters in the play
